posts.description: What things should a programmer implementing the technical details of a web application before making the site public?  If Jeff Atwood can forget about HttpOnly cookies, sitemaps, and cross-site request forgeries all in the same site, what important thing could I be forgetting as well?

posts.description: After two posts to a reaction of a comment on feedback I had for the Git installer, I thought it was pertinent to share my thoughts on OSS rules of engagement. Scott Chacon left a comment along the lines of … Continue reading →

posts.message:
we are currently looking for two skilled web developers based in Cairo/Egypt.
The Profile is:
***
- skilled and professional web developer with at least 3-5 years experience
- excellent skills in PHP/MySQL
- excellent skills in HTML5/Javasqript
- some experience with the Facebook API
- working within an existing framework, to deadlines, in a team
We are very interested in long term cooperation. So starting on a freelance basis, this could eventually lead to fulltime employment later on.
***
If this seems interesting to you, or you know anyone who is, please don't be shy, drop a message!
